item.title: Network automation - how to start?
item.description: coding…. I don’t talk much of my work in this blog and won’t go in the details here. In my role Technical Evangelist, one of my mission is the field enablement: transfer of knowledge from engineering, best practices as well as training on “adjacent technologies” i.
